      • setTexture

        public void setTexture(java.lang.String pUniformName,
              int pTexture)
        Parameters:
        pUniformName -
        pTexture - the index of the Texture to use. Similar to GLES20#GL_TEXTURE0, GLES20#GL_TEXTURE1, ... except that it is 0 based.

      • setTextureOptional

        public void setTextureOptional(java.lang.String pUniformName,
                      int pTexture)
        Parameters:
        pUniformName -
        pTexture - the index of the Texture to use. Similar to GLES20#GL_TEXTURE0, GLES20#GL_TEXTURE1, ... except that it is 0 based.
